mapper.select: SELECT t_stock.name AS stock_name, m_code.name AS unit_name, t_stock.stock_num FROM t_stock LEFT JOIN m_code ON t_stock.unit_id = m_code.code_id WHERE m_code.code_kbn = '1002' AND t_stock.id = #{id};

SELECT m_code.name as io_type_name, t_stock_io.io_num, t_stock_io.create_date as io_date, t_stock_io.create_user as io_user, t_stock_io.remarks FROM t_stock_io LEFT JOIN m_code ON t_stock_io.io_type = m_code.code_id WHERE m_code.code_kbn = '1001' AND t_stock_io.id = #{id}
AND m_code.code_id = #{iOTypeId}
